title: The Mobster's Nurse
description: I’m a nurse. I work at a hospital and care for people who need me.My life is simple. Square. The last thing I expected was to get entangled with a mobster on a rainy night in an alley.His name is Viper Roz, head of the ruthless Nordic Mafia.I should turn around and run away but I can’t. This large giant needs me. And what he needs, he gets.
author: Ever Lilac
